title: Connection Config for http_StatusCodeClient connection
help:
http_StatusCodeClient Connection

The HTTP status code client provides the capability for initiating contact with a remote HTTP service. The API it provides includes the functions for the standard HTTP methods forwarding a received request and sending requests using custom HTTP verbs. The responses can be binded to `http:StatusCodeResponse` types

value.name: connectionName
value.helpTip: The name for the http_StatusCodeClient connection
